column5: I was reminded on another site that some of the REGS changes this year for trout.  In alot of zones the limit is now 2 instead of 5.  So guys read your Regs before you go out.  Good luck everyone.
Thats correct............thank god!!!  Slot limits would have been nice as well
no prob guys, doesn't affect me as I am 99.9% catch and release all year long but lots of guys keep there fish.
I have 0 interest in keeping spawning trout, but I do enjoy keeping them out on the lake. Good on them for dropping the limit.
